types.name: Mutation
types.description: Entry-point for ConArtist GraphQL mutations

types.name: ConventionExtraInfo
types.description: Extra information about the convention, provided by the service

types.name: PriceAdd
types.description: Information required to create a new price

types.name: RecordDel
types.description: Information required to delete a sales record

types.name: Currency
types.description: Represents a type of currency

types.name: DateTimeUtc
types.description: DateTime

types.name: Price
types.description: Holds information about the price of a product or product type

types.name: SettingsMutation
types.description: Mutations to modify a user's settings

types.name: ConventionPages
types.description: Provides a wrapper for paginated conventions

types.name: Query
types.description: Entry-point of the ConArtist GraphQL API

fields.name: user
fields.description: Retrieves one user, corresponding to the provided ID

args.name: id
args.description: The ID of the user to retrieve. Leave out to request self

fields.name: userConvention
fields.description: Retrieves the full information of one user's convention

args.name: userId
args.description: The ID of the user to retrieve. Leave out to request self

args.name: conId
args.description: The ID of the convention to retrieve

fields.name: convention
fields.description: Retrieves one page of conventions which start after a given date

args.name: date
args.description: The earliest day for which to retrieve conventions. Defaults to the current time

args.name: limit
args.description: The limit on how many conventions to retrieve

args.name: excludeMine
args.description: Set to true to not get conventions the current user is already signed up for

types.name: FullUserConvention
types.description: Holds information about a convention and a user's products, prices, and records during that convention

types.name: ExpenseAdd
types.description: Information required to create a convention expense

types.name: ProductMod
types.description: Information required to modify an existing product

types.name: RecordMod
types.description: Information required to modify a sales record

types.name: ConventionUserInfo
types.description: Extra information about the convention, provided by users and ranked for trustworthiness

types.name: ProductTypeAdd
types.description: Information required to create a new product type

types.name: ProductType
types.description: Holds information about a product type

types.name: ProductTypeMod
types.description: Information required to modify an existing product type

types.name: DateTimeFixedOffset
types.description: DateTime

types.name: ProductInInventory
types.description: Holds information about a product

types.name: Expense
types.description: Holds information about a convention expense

types.name: Record
types.description: Holds information about a sale record

types.name: ExpenseMod
types.description: Information required to modify a convention expense

types.name: Money
types.description: Represents a monetary value and a currency as a string, such as CAD150 for $1.50 in CAD

types.name: PricePairOut
types.description: A Quantity-Price pair to represent part of a full pricing scheme of a product/product type

types.name: PriceDel
types.description: Information required to delete an existing price

types.name: ExpenseDel
types.description: Information required to delete a convention expense

types.name: Settings
types.description: Holds information about a user's settings

types.name: Convention
types.description: Holds information about a convention

types.name: User
types.description: Holds information about a user and their products, prices, and conventions

types.name: RecordAdd
types.description: Information required to create a sales record

types.name: ProductAdd
types.description: Information required to create a new product

types.name: PricePairIn
types.description: A Quantity-Price pair to represent part of a full pricing scheme of a product/product type
